message: Removing the electoral college would reduce the need for any candidate to campaign at all in low populations states, or if elected to even pay attention to problems those states have that should be addressed on a federal level. The electoral college was put in place to give low population states a seat at the table when it comes to electing presidents. The electoral college works and should never be removed.
